author: George White
description: Some might describe this as being a grown-up/vintage Porn Star Martini. It's spirituous and yet dry – despite the generous spoon of sugar which serves to amplify flavour and take the edge of the spirit.
name: Gargoyle No. 2
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut a passion fruit in half and scrape the flesh and seeds from both halves into shaker
Add other ingredients, shake with ice and strain into chilled glass
